oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge paper of Wesley McDonald, Co. E, 6th W. Va. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the second discharge of Wesley McDonald. He was first discharged in 1863 and then reenlisted and discharged a second time in 1865. The regiment spent most of the war guarding the Baltimore & Ohio Railroad. They were mustered out in June 1865.
